divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was informed by another reader Nellis AFB is currently having red flag games right now although normally the news mentions it but maybe I missed it, anyways what you describe sounds alot like flares dropped by plane or helicopter. They float down at a quick pace and are orange then fade out at a low alt., hope it helps.

Summary: 10 lights reported in sky to the north
